column5: Let me know if ya see them!!  You may recognize some of these people....  <object width="660" height="525"><param name="movie" value="  And these people!!  <object width="660" height="525"><param name="movie" value="
Those sure are some monsters in the first commercial. Huge Perch! figures all the TV hosts catching the lunkers. LOL
Okay... how much did WFN pay you to promote them in this thread?
LOL. I wish they were paying me..
Good for you TJ.  Speculate in order to accumulate  Wll keep an eye out and have a feeling of pride knowing the work that you have done is being seen by other fishers.  Cheers  David  aka  Superdad
....Moving on up.    Perhaps I could interest you in doing fishing seminars next?
TJ,  Better hope they don't air it during Lunkerville or Charlie Moore or you be wasting your time  Good job looking forward to seeing them.
I could put seminars on "how not to fish" , "how not to drink", and "how not to drink and fish" ... other than that, your outta luck!!
Those were pretty good!  ... but sex and comedy sell!!!  I'm thinkin' you'd draw much more attention with Miss Monique in a bikini telling her Barracuda story!
